title: 9/13/21: Vaccine Mandate, 9/11 Retrospective, Dubya's Speech, Drone Strikes, Bernie vs Manchin, Cali Recall, Wall St Greed, and More!

itunes:author: Breaking Points
itunes:subtitle: Krystal and Saagar talk about Biden's vaccine mandate, the 9/11 documents, George W. Bush's speech about 9/11, a fatal final drone strike in Afghanistan, Joe Manchin playing hardball, 9/11 war criminals, GOP's dreams fading in California, Wall Street greed with Matt Stoller, and more!
